tweet: The release of #Hornet v0.4.0 is coming next week! This new version of our node software will be a lot easier to install, manage & run, and will make the #IOTA network significantly more performant. Together with the community we're right now running some final tests. Stay tuned.  https://t.co/fhVvWk76wR

A guide to upcoming IOTA 2.0 (Coordicide) terminology.  With the #Coordicide specifications nearing completion, we want to share a simple & standard terminology for our new components. Read about the 3 layers of the #IOTA Protocol & get the full glossary:  https://t.co/ViL5IxRnz2

We’ve also been working hard to improve the UX of our node software with #Hornet v0.4.0. Four major improvements you can expect: a one line APT install, a new node health monitoring API w/ new Tangle visualizer & #autopeering for fast node setup. #IOTA  https://t.co/vgR3bmZinA
Our community node becomes the de facto standard node software of #iota 🥰
We'll release HORNET v0.4.0 next week.  Stay tuned!  #StrongerTogether #IOTA #CommunityNode #HORNET
